    return ++a;
  };
  return inner;

    (function () {
  var a = 0;
  var intervalId = null;
  var inner = function () {
    if (++a >= 10) {
      clearInterval(intervalId);
      inner = null; // inner ì‹ë³„ìì˜ í•¨ìˆ˜ ì°¸ì¡°ë¥¼ ëŠìŒ
    }
    console.log(a);
  };
  intervalId = setInterval(inner, 1000);
})();
